sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词都有"表示"之意。
means: indicate ： 指用词语或标记表达较明确的意义。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"表示……的意思"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: mean, imply, indicate, represent, denote, signify, suggest
means: mean ： 最普通用词。指文字或符号等所表示的各种明确的或含蓄的意义。
imply ： 侧重用文字或符号表示的联想，暗示。
denote ： 指某一词字面或狭义的意思，或指某些符号或迹象的特指含义。
signify ： 指用文字、说话或表情等表示单纯的意思。
suggest ： 通常指暗含地、隐晦地表达意思。

sentence.Network_en: We often denote danger by red letters.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们常常用红字表示危险.

sentence.Network_en: Red eyes denote strain and fatigue.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼睛充血表明压力过大、身心疲惫。

sentence.Network_en: Sometime the term artesian is used to denote a confined aquifer.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时候人们也用自流含水层这一术语表示承压含水层.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'be a sign of, mark out'): from French dénoter or Latin denotare, from de- 'away, thoroughly' + notare 'observe, note' (from nota 'a mark')

entry.tran: 预示;是…的征兆;表示;是…的标志
entry.def: If one thing denotes another, it is a sign or indication of it.

example.ex: Red eyes denote strain and fatigue...
example.tran: 眼睛充血表明压力过大、身心疲惫。

example.ex: There was a message waiting, denoting that someone had been here ahead of her.
example.tran: 有了一条留言，这表示有人已先于她到了这儿。

entry.def: What a symbol denotes is what it represents.

example.ex: In figure 24 'D' denotes quantity demanded and 'S' denotes quantity supplied.
example.tran: 在图 24 中，D 代表需求量而 S 代表供应量。

entry.def: What a word or name denotes is what it means or refers to.

example.ex: In the Middle Ages the term 'drab' denoted a very simple type of woollen cloth which was used by peasants to make their clothes.
example.tran: 中世纪时，drab（“本色布”）一词指的是一种农民用来制衣的非常普通的羊毛织物。

means.word_mean: 1. be a sign or indication of;

auth_sentence.content: Handcuffs denote kinky; an upraised palm means discipline.
auth_sentence.res_content: Handcuffs denote kinky; an upraised palm means discipline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Handcuffs denote kinky; an upraised palm means discipline.

auth_sentence.content: Sequences of numbers were used to denote particular juggling moves.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sequences of numbers were used to denote particular juggling moves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sequences of numbers were used to denote particular juggling moves.

auth_sentence.content: Colours will denote seating Invitations are colour-coded.
auth_sentence.res_content: Colours will denote seating Invitations are colour-coded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Colours will denote seating Invitations are colour-coded.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 显而易见的, 值得注意的
stems_affixes.word_buile: notice注意到,注意+able……的→adj.显而易见的, 值得注意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 臭名昭著的,声名狼藉的
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+orious多……的→多惹人注意的→臭名昭著的
notorious[[adj.臭名昭著的,声名狼藉的]]→n.臭名昭彰
denote[v.指示,表示,意味着]+ation表名词→n.指示

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得注意的,显著的,著名的
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+able能……的→n.值得注意的,显著的,著名的
not知道,注意,注释+e→n.笔记；注释 v.注意到
note笔记+book→n.笔记簿, 笔记本

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通知,通告,布告;注意,认识
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+ice表名词→n.通知,通告,布告;注意,认识 v.注意到,注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 概念,想法,意念,看法,观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+ion表名词→n.概念,想法,意念,看法,观点
de加强+not知道,注意,注释+e→指示
not知道,注意,注释+e→n.笔记；注释 v.注意到
not知道,注意,注释+ify表动词→给以注意→通知
not知道,注意,注释+ice表名词→n.通知,通告,布告;注意,认识 v.注意到,注意

means.word_mean: 为…的符号; 为…的名称,标志；预示；象征

sentences.en: In algebra, the sign X usually denotes an unknown quantity.
sentences.cn: 在代数里, 符号X常用来表示未知数。

means.word_mean: 指示; 指出,表示；意指

sentences.en: We often denote danger by red letters.
sentences.cn: 我们常常用红字表示危险。
